description: Whether you are looking for ways to help the nvironment or you want to know how to save money by using less hot water, Go Green and Save Green is for you! Never before have so many great tips and tricks been compiled and made so accessible. The Go Green and Save Green ebook offers the best ways to help you and your family save the environment and save money. In today's market it is easy to spend excess money on environmentally friendly products that aren't even that friendly! Topics include learning about rebates, heating, insulation, maintenance and DIY ways to make your life efficient. There simply isn't a better resource at a better price, get this guide today!
